title: PlayStation Responds to Xbox's Activision Blizzard Deal - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.20.22
description:
Greg and Tim run you through today's Xbox shockwaves, good and bad news about LEGO Star Wars: Skywalker Saga, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:15 - Housekeeping

There’s a new Kinda Funny Podcast up! In it, we call Fanbyte’s Michael Higham to dig through Blessing’s trash!

There’s a new Peacemaker Screencast up!

Help us out by filling out the RT Podcast survey about all the Kinda Funny Podcasts -- it only says "Kinda Funny Podcast" but they mean all of our podcasts. It takes just a few minutes and helps our network understand what you like about us! kindafunny.com/podcastsurvey


The Roper Report -

00:07:50 - PlayStation Responds to Xbox
00:25:45 - LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga’s Good News and Bad News
00:39:14 - Ads
00:40:14 - Dying Light 2 Threatens 350K Words, 40K Lines Of Dialogue
00:46:17 - Halo’s BTB Still Broken
00:49:25 - New World Won't See New Content In February
00:50:33 - VR ain’t Dead! NPD Group
00:56:17 - Hot Damn: That Horizon Cast!
00:59:08 - Out today
01:01:34 - NVIDIA GeForce Update
01:02:20 - Squad Up: Ryan K - Xbox - BiggerActor773
01:03:32 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Tam
